   /*
  <!-- Constants -->
  <Variable name="sSFont" description="Font System" type="font" default="400 14px Arial, sans-serif" hideEditor="true" value="400 14px Arial, sans-serif"/>
  <Variable name="body.background" description="Background" color="$(body.background.color)" type="background" default="$(color) none repeat scroll center center" hideEditor="true" value="$(color) url() no-repeat scroll center center /* Credit: Dagruel (https://dagruel.com) */;"/>
  <Variable name="body.text.font" description="Body Text Font" type="font" default="$(sSFont)" hideEditor="true" value="400 14px Arial, sans-serif"/>
  <Variable name="body.link.color" description="Link color" type="color" default="$(sS.main.color)" hideEditor="true" value="#c70039"/>
  <Variable name="posts.title.color" description="Post title color" type="color" default="$(body.text.color)" hideEditor="true" value="#2f2f2f"/>
  <Variable name="posts.icons.color" description="Post info color" type="color" default="#a20a0a" hideEditor="true" value="#a20a0a"/>
  <Variable name="tabs.font" description="Tabs Font" type="font" default="$(sSFont)" hideEditor="true" value="400 14px Arial, sans-serif"/>
  <Variable name="tabs.color" description="Tabs color" type="color" default="#dddfe2" hideEditor="true" value="#dddfe2"/>
  <Variable name="tabs.color.dark" description="Tabs color dark" type="color" default="#444" hideEditor="true" value="#444444"/>
  <Variable name="labels.background.color" description="Labels background color" type="color" default="#fff" hideEditor="true" value="#ffffff"/>

  <Group description="sS Color Light">
    <Variable name="sS.main.color" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#a20a0a" value="#a20a0a"/>
    <Variable name="body.text.color" description="Body Text Color" type="color" default="#2f2f2f" value="#2f2f2f"/>
    <Variable name="body.link.hover.color" description="All Hover Color" type="color" default="#a20a0a" value="#a20a0a"/>
    <Variable name="body.background.color" description="Body Background Color" type="color" default="#ededed" value="#ededed"/>
    <Variable name="posts.background.color" description="Posts Background Color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
  </Group>

  <Group description="sS Color Dark">
    <Variable name="sS.main.color.dark" description="Main Color Dark" type="color" default="$(posts.background.color.dark)" value="#242831"/>
    <Variable name="body.text.color.dark" description="Body Text Color Dark" type="color" default="#ddd" value="#dddddd"/>
    <Variable name="body.background.color.dark" description="Body Background Color Dark" type="color" default="#1c1f26" value="#1c1f26"/>
    <Variable name="posts.background.color.dark" description="Posts Background Color Dark" type="color" default="#242831" value="#242831"/>
  </Group>

  <Group description="Item Post Light">
    <Variable name="big.title.color" description="Big Title Color" type="color" default="#fff"  value="#ffffff"/>
    <Variable name="posts.text.color" description="Post Text Color" type="color" default="#515a5d"  value="#515a5d"/>
    <Variable name="posts.link.color" description="Post Link Color" type="color" default="$(sS.main.color)" value="#c70039"/>
  </Group>

  <Group description="Item Post Dark">
    <Variable name="big.title.color.dark" description="Big Title Color Dark" type="color" default="#fff"  value="#ffffff"/>
    <Variable name="posts.text.color.dark" description="Post Text Color Dark" type="color" default="#9ba3b5"  value="#9ba3b5"/>
  </Group>

  <Group description="Footer">
    <Variable name="footer.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="$(sS.main.color)"  value="#f5f7fa"/>
    <Variable name="footer.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
    <Variable name="footer.link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#f37121"  value="#ffeb3b"/>
  </Group> */
  /* ======================================
  seleSeven Blogger Template - Designed by Dagruel (dagruel.com)
  ======================================
  Name      : seleSeven
  Version   : 1.3
  Date      : 19/04/2021
  Demo      : https://seleseven.blogspot.com
  Type      : Free
  Designer  : Dagruel
  Country   : Indonesia
  Website   : https://dagruel.com
  ***************************************
  This theme is free.
  *************************************** */
  :root{
  --sSMainLight:$(sS.main.color);
  --sSMainDark:$(sS.main.color.dark);
  --sSBodyLight:$(body.background.color);
  --sSBodyDark:$(body.background.color.dark);
  --sSPostLight:$(posts.background.color);
  --sSPostDark:$(posts.background.color.dark);
  --sSTextLight:$(body.text.color);
  --sSTextDark:$(body.text.color.dark);
  --sSItemLight:$(posts.text.color);
  --sSItemDark:$(posts.text.color.dark);
  --sSTabsLight:$(tabs.color);
  --sSTabsDark:$(tabs.color.dark);
  --sSFooter:$(footer.background.color);
  --sSTextFooter:$(footer.text.color);
  --sSLinkFooter:$(footer.link.color);
  --sSLink:$(body.link.color);
  --sSLinkHover:$(body.link.hover.color);
  --sSLinkItem:$(posts.link.color);
  --sSBigTitle:$(big.title.color);
  --sSIcons:$(posts.icons.color);
  --sSFont:'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif;
  --sSFontNormal:'Roboto', sans-serif;
  }

  html{font-family:sans-serif;-ms-text-size-adjust:100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust:100%}body{margin:0}article,aside,details,figcaption,figure,footer,header,hgroup,main,nav,section,summary{display:block}audio,canvas,progress,video{display:inline-block;vertical-align:baseline}audio:not([controls]){display:none;height:0}[hidden],template{display:none}a{background:transparent}a:active,a:hover{outline:0}abbr[title]{border-bottom:1px dotted}dfn{font-style:italic}mark{background:#ff0;color:#000}small{font-size:80%}sub,sup{font-size:75%;line-height:0;position:relative;vertical-align:baseline}sup{top:-0.5em}sub{bottom:-0.25em}img{border:0}hr{-moz-box-sizing:content-box;box-sizing:content-box;height:0}pre{overflow:auto}code,kbd,pre,samp{font-family:monospace,monospace;font-size:1em}button,input,optgroup,select,textarea{color:inherit;font:inherit;margin:0}button{overflow:visible;border:0px;outline:0px;margin:0px;box-shadow:none;}button,select{text-transform:none;outline:none}button,html input[type="button"],input[type="reset"],input[type="submit"]{-webkit-appearance:button;cursor:pointer}button[disabled],html input[disabled]{cursor:default}button::-moz-focus-inner,input::-moz-focus-inner{border:0;padding:0;outline:none;}input{line-height:normal;border:0px;outline:0px}input[type="checkbox"],input[type="radio"]{box-sizing:border-box;padding:0}input[type="number"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,input[type="number"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button{height:auto}input[type="search"]{-webkit-appearance:textfield;-moz-box-sizing:content-box;-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;box-sizing:content-box}input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-decoration{-webkit-appearance:none}fieldset{border:1px solid #c0c0c0;margin:0 2px;padding:.35em .625em .75em}legend{border:0;padding:0}textarea{overflow:auto}optgroup{font-weight:bold}table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0}td,th{padding:0}focus{outline:none}h1{font-size:1.75em}iframe{width:100%}

  /* CSS 1 */
  body,html{font:400 14px var(--sSFontNormal);color:var(--sSTextLight);line-height:1.52857143}body{background-color:var(--sSBodyLight);padding:0!important;margin:0;position:relative;overflow-x:hidden;transition:background-color .3s ease;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent}body.oV{overflow-y:hidden}a{color:var(--sSLink);text-decoration:none}a,button,html{transition:all .3s ease-out}img{max-width:100%;height:auto;object-fit:cover}.check{display:none}#seleSeven{display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;flex-wrap:nowrap;align-items:flex-start;max-width:1185px;margin:auto;padding:30px}.sS_header{min-width:200px;max-width:200px;position:sticky;position:-webkit-sticky;top:15px;margin-bottom:15px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap;z-index:2;transition:all .3s ease}#header{text-transform:uppercase;margin-bottom:30px}header .sceneHead h1{margin:0;display:none}#header .sceneHead,#header .sceneHead a,.sS_header.active #header .sceneHead,.sS_header.search-active #header .sceneHead{display:block;width:100%;height:45px;min-height:100%}#header .sceneHead,#header .widget.Header{background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:contain;background-position:left center;transition:all .3s ease-out}.separator{line-height:0}.separator a{display:unset!important;pading:0!important}
  /* Image Di desktop */
  #header .sceneHead, .sS_header.active #header .sceneHead, .sS_header.search-active #header .sceneHead {
    background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,');
  }
  @media screen and (max-width:1024px){
    #header {margin-bottom:15px}#header .widget.Header .behind a {height:20px}
    /* Image Di Tablet */
    #header .sceneHead {
      background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,');
      width: 24px;
      height: 24px;
    }
  }
  @media screen and (max-width:600px) {
    #header {margin-bottom:0}
    /* Image Di Smartphone */
    #header .sceneHead, .sS_header.active #header .sceneHead, .sS_header.search-active #header .sceneHead {
      background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,');
    }
    #header .sceneHead a, #header .sceneHead, .sS_header.active #header .sceneHead, .sS_header.search-active #header .sceneHead{width: 168px;height: 30px}
  }
  /* CSS 2 */
  main{max-width:calc(100% - 200px);width:100%}.postHome>.inner,main>.inner{display:inline-block;width:100%}#iklanTops{margin:0 0 30px 30px}.post_inSingle #main{margin:0 0 15px 30px}.post_inFeed #main{margin:0 30px 15px;width:calc(100% -   /* Back to Top */

  /* Lazy Image */
  img.lazy{background:linear-gradient(to right,#f6f7f8 8%,#ddd 18%,#f6f7f8 33%) #f6f7f8;background-size:800px 104px;animation:dagruelPlaceholder 1.5s linear infinite;-moz-animation:dagruelPlaceholder 1.5s linear infinite;-webkit-animation:dagruelPlaceholder 1.5s linear infinite;-o-animation:dagruelPlaceholder 1.5s linear infinite;transition:all .3s ease}
  /* post_inFeed */
  .data .entry-title,.data .ep_item,.data .status{white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis}.bItem,.mItem,.postItem{position:relative;overflow:hidden;transition:all .2s;-webkit-transition:all .2s;-moz-transition:all .2s}.bItem .snippet-thumbnail,.mItem .snippet-thumbnail,.postItem .snippet-thumbnail{padding:140% 0 0;position:relative;overflow:hidden;background:#f1f1f1}.bItem .snippet-thumbnail{padding:77% 0 0}.bItem img,.mItem img,.postItem img{position:absolute;top:0;height:100%;width:100%}.category,.score{position:absolute;padding:5px;font-size:11px;z-index:1}.category{left:0;font-weight:600;color:#fff;background:var(--sSMainLight);top:7px;text-transform:uppercase}.score{right:0;font-weight:500;bottom:0;background:rgba(0,0,0,.8);color:rgba(255,255,255,.9);padding:3px}.bItem .data,.mItem .data,.postItem .data{font-size:13px;color:#666;height:auto}.data .entry-title{display:block;width:100%;font-size:14px;font-weight:500;color:#222d34;line-height:21px;padding-top:8px;margin:0}.data .entry-title a{color:#222d34}.bItem .data .entry-title{margin-bottom:7px;padding-bottom:6px;border-bottom:solid 3px #f5f7fa}.data .ep_item,.data .status{margin-top:3px;color:#757a7d}.bItem:hover .category,.bItem:hover .score,.mItem:hover .category,.mItem:hover .score,.postItem:hover .category,.postItem:hover .score{display:none}.score:before{content:'';display:inline-block;min-width:15px;min-height:15px;margin-right:2px;vertical-align:middle;background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 24 24' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath d='M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z' fill='%23ffd600'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center;background-size:15px}.bItem .data{height:120px;padding:0 4px}
  /* Static Page */
  .homeStaticPage{padding:15px 20px;background:var(--sSPostLight);border-radius:7px;position:relative;transition:all .3s ease-out}.homeStaticPage h1{margin:0}.homeStaticPage .post-body{font-size:16px;color:var(--sSTextLight);margin:20px 0;line-height:1.75em;word-break:break-word}
  /* Chapter Title on Post */
  .headChapter{padding:15px;transition:all .3s ease;text-align:center;margin-bottom:20px;background:var(--sSPostLight)}.headChapter svg{width:14px;height:14px;vertical-align:-3px}.headChapter svg path{fill:var(--sSIcons)}.headChapter h1{font-size:24px;color:var(--sSMainLight);padding:7px 0;margin:0 0 7px;border-bottom:1px solid #ddd}.chapterMeta{margin-bottom:10px}.chapterMeta li,.chapterMeta ul{list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0}.chapterMeta ul li{font-size:12px;display:inline-block;margin-right:7px;text-transform:capitalize}
  /* Next Prev */
  #readMode,#sS_ecFile{margin-top:20px}#ecHome a,#readMode{padding:5px 10px}#readMode,.nextPrev>div a{background:var(--sSMainLight);color:#fff}.nextPrev{display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;flex-wrap:nowrap;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between}.nextPrev>div a{font-size:15px}.nextPrev>div a[href='']{display:none}#ecPrev a{padding:5px 10px 5px 0}#ecNext a{padding:5px 0 5px 10px}.nextPrev svg{display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;width:24px;height:24px}.nextPrev svg path{fill:#fff}#readMode{text-align:center;cursor:pointer}.ec_Main .nextPrev{display:none}#chapterSelect{padding:7px;margin-bottom:20px;color:#333;background:#fff;width:100%;border:1px solid #ddd}.headChapter #chapterSelect{margin:0}

  /* Sinopsis */
  .alternaiv,.desc h3,.judul h1{font-weight:500}.dagruel-sinopsis{overflow:hidden;z-index:99;background:#fff;margin-bottom:20px;border-bottom:1px solid #f1f1f1}.dagruel-sinopsis .right{overflow:hidden;padding:10px}.sinojudul{overflow:hidden;margin:5px 0;border-bottom:1px solid #eceff5;padding-bottom:13px}.judul h1{font-size:24px;line-height:34px;color:#222d34;float:left;display:contents;margin:0 0 5px}.judul span.trailer{padding:7px;margin-left:5px;font-size:13px;line-height:28px;display:inline-block}.judul span.trailer a svg{color:#ef5350}.alternaiv{color:#333;overflow:hidden;width:100%}.alternaiv span{font-size:13px;line-height:20px;padding-right:13px;display:inline-block;float:left}.alternaiv span:after{content:"/";padding-left:11px}.alternaiv span:last-child:after{content:""}.desc{line-height:1.4em;color:#888}.desc h3{font-size:17px;color:#222;margin:0 0 10px}.desc p{margin:0 0 10px;overflow:hidden;font-size:14px;font-weight:400;color:#222d34;line-height:26px}.genre-info{display:block;margin-top:10px}.genre-info span a{padding:0 10px;display:-webkit-inline-box;margin-right:7px;margin-bottom:6px;font-size:13px;border-radius:4px;background:#f5f7fa}.genre-info span:hover a{background-color:var(--sSLink);color:#fff}@media screen and (max-width:875px){.dagruel-sinopsis .left{padding:10px;text-align:center}.sinojudul{text-align:center}.desc{margin-left:5px}}

  /* Image Not Streaming */
  #notStreaming:before{
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  bottom: 10px;
  right: 0;
  left: 0;
  background-image: url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AZZnbxGdtYg/YBoSgYA_bsI/AAAAAAAAH24/QQR0FpmXMkIh7HlUE5N2wynrA6iqAw0MwCPcBGAYYCw/s0/20210203_110251.jpg);
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: contain;
  background-position: center;
  }
  /* Related Post Custom */
  #relatedPostDagruel{margin-bottom:20px;width:100%;background:#fff;border-radius:2px;padding-bottom:0}#relatedPostDagruel h2{border:0;padding:9px 19px;border-bottom:1px solid #f1f1f1;float:none;font-size:19px;font-weight:500;margin:0 0 10px}#relatedPostDagruel .relatedDag{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr);grid-gap:15px;padding:0 10px 10px}.relatedDag .ruelPost{position:relative;overflow:hidden;transition:all .2s;-webkit-transition:all .2s;-moz-transition:all .2s}.ruelPost a{text-decoration:none}.ruelPost .isThumb{padding:140% 0 0;position:relative;overflow:hidden;background:#f1f1f1;line-height:0}.isThumb img{object-fit:cover}.ruelPost .data{height:auto;text-align:center}.ruelPost .data .title{font-weight:500;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;color:#222d34;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap;width:100%;padding-top:3px}
  /* Ply Hover */
  .ply{z-index:1;background:rgba(0,0,0,.67);visibility:hidden;opacity:0;transition:visibility 0s,opacity .3s linear}.ply,.ply:before,.ruelPost .isThumb img{position:absolute;top:0;height:100%;width:100%}.bItem:hover .ply,.mItem:hover .ply,.postItem:hover .ply,.ruelPost:hover .ply{visibility:visible;opacity:1}.bItem:hover .ply:before,.mItem:hover .ply:before,.postItem:hover .ply:before,.ruelPost:hover .ply:before{opacity:15}

#top:before{content:'';width:12px;height:calc(100% - 20px);position:absolute;right:0;top:0;padding:10px;cursor:pointer;background:url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 24 24'   /* Social Share */
  .sS_Share,.sS_Share .icons{flex-wrap:nowrap}.sS_Share,.sS_Share a{transition:all .3s ease}.sS_Share{position:relative;display:-webkit-box;display:flex;align-items:center;color:#fff;z-index:1;margin-bottom:20px}.sS_Share.show{position:sticky;position:-webkit-sticky;bottom:0}.sS_Share svg{width:17px;height:17px;margin:auto;text-align:center}.sS_Share svg path{fill:#fff}.sS_Share .icons{display:-webkit-box;display:flex;align-items:center;font-weight:500;color:var(--sSMainLight);font-size:1.5em;margin-right:10px}.sS_Share .icons svg path{fill:var(--sSMainLight)}.sS_Share i{font-style:normal;margin:0 3px;line-height:0}.sS_Share a{display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;flex-wrap:nowrap;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;width:100%;color:#fff;padding:7px;border-radius:25px;box-shadow:none}.sS_Share a:not(:last-child){margin-right:7px}.sS_Share a:hover{box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 99999px rgba(255,255,255,.25)}.sS_Share a.facebook{background-color:#3a579a}.sS_Share a.telegram{background-color:#08c}.sS_Share a.twitter{background-color:#00abf0}.sS_Share a.pinterest{background-color:#cd1c1f}.sS_Share a.linkedin{background-color:#2554BF}.sS_Share a.tumblr{background-color:#314358}.sS_Share a.whatsapp{background-color:#4dc247}.sS_Share a.messenger{background-color:#448aff}@media screen and (max-width:680px){.sS_Share{justify-content:space-between}.sS_Share a{justify-content:center}.sS_Share a:not(:last-child){margin-right:5px}}
  /* Media Screen */
  @media screen and (max-width:1200px){.multiplePost,.customPost{grid-template-columns:repeat(3, 1fr)}}

  /* Custom CSS 2 */
  


  
    
    body#layout{
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #111d5e;
    padding: 87px 10px 10px;
    }
    body#layout .hidden,
    body#layout .invisible{
    display: inherit;
    }
    body#layout #seleSeven:before{
    content: 'SeleSeven v1.0';
    position: absolute;
    top: 20px;
    right: 10px;
    border: 3px solid #111d5e;
    font: normal 400 28px 'Roboto', sans-serif;
    color: #111d5e;
    padding: 10px;
    width: 200px;
    height: 30px;
    line-height:30px;
    border-radius: 50px;
    }
    body#layout .sS_header{
    float:left;
    width:30%
    }
    body#layout main{
    float:right;
    width:70%
    }
    body#layout nav ul, body#layout nav ul li {
    list-style:none;
    margin:0;
    padding:0
    }
    body#layout main > .inner {
    display:flex;
    }
    body#layout main > .inner > .section {
    width:100%;
    }
    body#layout main > .inner > aside {
    width:100%;
    }
    body#layout div#HTML1:before, body#layout .sS_Menu:after {
    content:'Custom Post by Label';
    display: block;
    position: relative;
    font:normal 400 20px 'Roboto',sans-serif;
    color: #444;
    background-color: #ccc;
    margin: 6px;
    padding:20px;
    border: 1px solid #bbb;
    border-radius: 25px;
    }
    body#layout .sS_Menu:after {
    content:'Bagian Menu yang lain bisa di edit lewat Template'
    }
